item.title: By: Eirik
item.dc:creator: Eirik
item.description: Thanks for shearing! This fixed the problem with the iphone app as described here: http://iphone.wordpress.org/faq/
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for shearing!
This fixed the problem with the iphone app as described here: http://iphone.wordpress.org/faq/

Thanks, but the person who really deserves the credit is foks, who brought up the issue in this ticket: http://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/9380

item.title: By: Finally able to post from my iPhone! - payello
